snippet: A month that often brings the doldrums to Broadway this year instead brought audiences and ticket sales at their highest levels since the 2008 recession.
abstract: Broadway show tickets sales in September 2014 grew to their highest levels since 2008 recession, thanks to unusual combination of new plays and long-running musicals; major factor for boost in sales is a larger roster--30 shows ran, compared with 26 in 2013.
lead_paragraph: A month that often brings the doldrums to Broadway this year instead brought audiences and ticket sales at their highest levels since the 2008 recession.

headline.main: September Was Warm on Broadway, Too
headline.print_headline: September Was Warm on Broadway, Too
